name: Death Is That Way
description:
Death is That Way is a Sci-Fi Action Puzzler game.

In this prototype, use a mouse to point and click for all actions.

Our aims for the final game included the following.

● You play v1.0 of the Chimeran AI Crawler Bot, training for battle

● Play style would be analysed in real time, game would respond with unique progression

● Highly repeatable play, over a thousand “rooms”, no backtracking

● Escape rooms using “OmniRings” before you’re squeezed out

● OmniRings have many abilities aﬀecting you or the environment

● OmniRings can be leveled up and reprogrammed

● Rooms of many sizes and with many challenges, suitable for all play styles

● Supremely simple control. Single taps, clear context, easy movement

I'd love to know your thoughts, and if you're an interested publisher, I'd love to talk.
